DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether BL-8040 is safe, tolerable and effective in the mobilization of Hematopoietic Stem Cells (HSC) in healthy volunteers
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study Evaluating Safety, Tolerability, PK and PD of BL-8040 for Stem Cell Mobilization in Healthy Volunteers
